long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Works in conjunction with the Vault Android Password Manager app to allow users to send their passwords from the app to the computer clipboard to be used on the chrome browser. When a password has been successfully transmitted the the extension creates an alert on the browser with a message.
